question: What did the company do to reduce their inventory liability?
answer: - Coordinate Performance Management process - Open Enrollment premium analysis and meeting coordinating - Payroll processing using ADP software - Managed office relocations for two mid-size companies plus expansion of a start-up - Decreased inventory liability by 40% (Dreyer’s employee company Store): implemented controls on stock and standardized ordering procedures - Negotiated reduced rates with the two highest paid vendors for a 20% cost savings".
